name: Eiffel Tower
description: Iconic iron lattice tower in Paris, one of the most recognized structures in the world
bestTimeToVisit: April to June, September to October

name: Great Wall of China
description: Ancient fortification system spanning thousands of kilometers across northern China
bestTimeToVisit: April to May, September to November

name: Taj Mahal
description: White marble mausoleum in Agra, a symbol of eternal love and architectural beauty

name: Machu Picchu
description: Ancient Incan citadel set high in the Andes Mountains

name: Grand Canyon
description: Breathtaking natural wonder carved by the Colorado River over millions of years
bestTimeToVisit: March to May, September to November
